generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and a Mercedes-Benz logo on the hood, indicating the perspective is from a vehicle on the road.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, bordered by a curb and some vegetation.
- building: A white house with a dark roof is visible on the right side of the road.
- fence: A low fence or barrier is visible along the property line of the house on the right.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including traffic light poles and utility poles.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible hanging over the road, showing a green light.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a diamond-shaped sign and a circular sign.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along the road and in front of the house.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: Several people are visible walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the road.
- car: A silver car is visible in front of the vehicle from which the image is taken.
- terrain: Some grassy areas are visible along the sidewalk and in front of the house.
